post:
Hey,

i have found an offer for a free dedicated Server for 1 month with option for not renew (prepaid).

Go to: http://partners.webmasterplan.com/click.asp?ref=730251&site=11059&type=text&tnb=6 
Then add the Moonshot M to your shoppingcart.
Chose 1 month contract duration and remove the Automatically option for prepaid.
Use the coupon: AF-5K4DF03f14-165 (from https://www.vserver-preis-vergleich.de/webtropia-com-gutscheine/)

After a SMS verification and a little bit of waiting you get your server.

Have fun.
